item.title: How to setup Solus
item.description: Linux Solus Setup solus for programming http://www.stuartellis.name/articles/solus-setup/ solbuild https://github.com/solus-project/solbuild https://github.com/examachine/pisi Linux Solus Images https://www.solus-project.com/image_root/ arch examples for making a docker image arch file http://mirror.bytemark.co.uk/archlinux/iso/2018.03.01/ bootstrap arch https://github.com/tokland/arch-bootstrap Chroot chroot example http://www.ubuntubuzz.com/2015/09/a-basic-chroot-example-in-ubuntu.html https://www.computerhope.com/unix/chroot.htm https://www.cyberciti.biz/faq/unix-linux-chroot-command-examples-usage-syntax/
